short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mystical and present wallpaper takes you into a tranquil scene beneath the moonlight.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This mysterious and somber background transports you to a tranquil scene under a full moon. A small island floats in the deep, dark night, illuminated by the pale yellow light of a large moon. Wispy clouds surround the island, with the silhouettes of a tree and a few crosses adding to the eerie and cold atmosphere.
